description:
## Channels

Raven helps you and your team communicate with each other.

Conversation happen in **channels**. 

All users who have access to Raven can view and send messages in **Open** channels. 

**Public** channels are visible to everyone, but only members can take send messages in them. Any user can join public channels. 

**Private** channels are only visible to members and new members can only be added by the channel admin - which is the creator of the channel. 

You could also send messages to other users privately via **Direct messages** - including yourself!

A user could create as many channels and add as many users as they want to in them.
name: Introduction to Raven
title: Understanding Channels
